Package com.intellij.openapi.options

Interface Configurable.NoScroll

    Enclosing interface:
    Configurable

    public static interface Configurable.NoScroll
    This marker interface notifies the Settings dialog to not add scroll bars to the Swing form. Required when the Swing form contains its own scrollable components.
